There is some confusion regarding the restroom policy at Riverview Elementary that HCSD would like to clarify.

All homerooms will have two scheduled restroom breaks during the day--one in the morning and one in the afternoon.

In order to avoid students being in the restroom during another classroom's scheduled break, we encourage students to use the restroom during those times.

If there is an emergency a student will be permitted to use the restroom outside of their scheduled time.

All social distancing requirements and guidelines will be followed to ensure the safety of all staff and students.
